text: Table 15-3. Select Instance-Level Members of the Thread Type Instance-Level Member Meaning in Life IsAlive Returns a Boolean that indicates whether this thread has been started (and has not yet terminated or aborted). IsBackground Gets or sets a value indicating whether this thread is a “background thread” (more details in just a moment). Name Allows you to establish a friendly text name of the thread. Priority Gets or sets the priority of a thread, which may be assigned a value from the ThreadPriority enumeration. (continued)
